scripts.start-flappy: cp -R projects/flappy-bird/static/* dist/flappy-bird && parcel projects/flappy-bird/index.html --dist-dir dist/flappy-bird
scripts.start-pong: cp -R projects/pong/static/* dist/pong && parcel projects/pong/index.html --dist-dir dist/pong
scripts.start-breakout: cp -R projects/breakout/static/* dist/breakout && parcel projects/breakout/index.html --dist-dir dist/breakout
